  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_94735</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_94735</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water evaporation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserverdampfung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Évaporation de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Evaporação da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Evaporazione dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξάτμιση ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Evaporación del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that leaving a measuring cylinder of water for a week will result to evaporation of some of its contents.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">balance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">measuring cylinder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß das das Lassen 
eines Meßzylinders des Wassers für eine Woche zur Verdampfung von 
einigem seines Inhalts resultiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que cela laisser un 
tube mesureur de l'eau pendant une semaine résultera à 
l'évaporation d'une partie de son contenu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que aquela deixar um 
cilindro de medição da água por uma semana resultará à 
evaporação de alguns de seus índices.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che quello lasciare 
di misuratore di acqua per una settimana risulterà ad evaporazione di
alcuno del relativo soddisfare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η αναχώρηση ενός 
μετρώντας κυλίνδρου του ύδατος για μια εβδομάδα θα οδηγήσει στην 
εξάτμιση μερικά από το περιεχόμενό της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que eso dejar un 
cilindro que mide del agua por una semana resultará a la evaporación
de alguno de su contenido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Balance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdampfung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
